title: jerry0
author: jerry0
content: Anyone in the US who bought it or any other devices from ledger can let me know how long shipping is taking?

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: They have that information in their site. It depends on the courrier used (DHL or Fedex) but it shouldn't take more than 2-5 business days. https://support.ledger.com/hc/en-us/articles/4403013285137-How-long-will-it-take-for-my-order-to-reach-me-?support=true

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.created_time: April 23, 2023, 06:45:30 AMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 04:58:49 PM by Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: OmegaStarScream on April 23, 2023, 05:16:28 AMThey have that information in their site. It depends on the courrier used (DHL or Fedex) but it shouldn't take more than 2-5 business days. Although, according to what I saw:Express shipping with FedEx Express (2 - 3 business working days) FreeExpress shipping with DHL (2 - 4 business working days) FreeTo know the number of days it can also take, when buying the Ledger Nano wallet, before you will be directed to pay, you will see the above image displayed for you to know the number of days it would take for the shipping.
